pages.text: I'm Aurukel, the one who wrote this book, and the author of the mod. You can check out my YouTube channel, where I post random nonsense. You can find my other socials like discord and twitter on there if you'd like to contact me.
As of 0.9.6, Zphen helped out by respriting the ruby, onyx, topaz, sapphire, and iridium toolsets. You can find his BlueSky profile below if you want to check out his work!
